description: Main entry point for the Flutter-based Audiobook Store application, setting up app-wide state management, theming, and the root widget.

classes.name: MyApp
classes.description: Root widget of the application, sets up state management, theming, and initial routing.

methods.name: main
methods.description: Application entry point, runs the app by instantiating MyApp.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for the MyApp widget, setting up Provider and MaterialApp.
